attributes.action: Freedompass should be granted to the disabled in Epping
attributes.additional_details:
The freedompass is free travel to those who are disabled and over 60 in London Boroughs.

Epping council do not offer this.  They offer a bus pass only.

Epping council have refused to offer the freedompass to residents.

This debate goes back as far as 2009 and still nothing has changed.

Please help the disabled and over 60’s in this borough to get what they deserve and what they are entitled too, which is free travel in London.

Every London borough offers this service, why should Epping be different.

Please help the residents of Epping to get what they are entitled too
